references.paper_title: SemanticKITTI: A dataset for semantic scene understanding of lidar sequences
references.reason: This paper introduces the SemanticKITTI dataset, a benchmark dataset extensively used in the paper for evaluating semantic scene completion, which is crucial for establishing the state-of-the-art performance.
This paper introduces the MonoScene method, a significant camera-based approach for semantic scene completion which is extensively compared against in the paper.

references.paper_title: VoxFormer: Sparse voxel transformer for camera-based 3D semantic scene completion
references.reason: This paper presents VoxFormer, a key method in semantic scene completion which the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Semantic scene completion from a single depth image
references.reason: This paper is foundational in defining the problem of semantic scene completion and its associated challenges, acting as a starting point for many subsequent works.

references.paper_title: Lift, splat, shoot: Encoding images from arbitrary camera rigs by implicitly unprojecting to 3D
references.reason: This paper introduces the Lift-Splat-Shoot technique, a widely used method for projecting 2D image features into 3D, which is heavily relevant to the methods employed in this paper.
